hiveArticle.title: [SmartphonePhotography] Mighty Waves in the Sea
hiveArticle.body:
This week's theme for smartphonephotography is: **Water**, initiated by @juliank. So I am sharing the image of a Wave in the Sea which was just going to touch my feet.

![IMG_20180108_100139.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmeQfSiMkUeDMeWc25iEnJZmNnR7AYWkcihHzEKmmQmB9P/IMG_20180108_100139.jpg)


### Camera : Nokia 6, No Editing Done
